alert.note: Alert for Gila (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 29 at 11:19PM MST until July 30 at 3:15AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Gila County in east central Arizona... * Until 315 AM MST. * At 1119 PM MST, Gauge reports indicated rapid rise along Tonto Creek due to upstream rainfall. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Heavy rain producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Gauges reported. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. Rapid rises have been reported on Tonto Creek. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Tonto Basin. The following low water crossings may experience flooding: A Crossing, Bar X Crossing, and Store Crossing. The current gauge reading on Tonto Creek at 11pm MST was 5.1 feet. FLASH FLOOD...GAUGE INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
